result.title: Implementation Difficulty in the String Problem
result.content: Please go through this problem 716B. My idea is : 1. if length of string in less than 26 , print "-1" and return ; 2. calculate frequency of first 26 characters and then see how many characters are left out and how many '?' are available . 3. If left out == cnt['?'] it is possible. 4. If not go for next 26. 4. I tried it but failed on 18th test case here? Could you help me with my implementation. Or if you have more elegant implementation please suggest me.
